question: A year ago, you lent your favorite book to a friend who you thought would enjoy it. Unfortunately, your friend has forgotten to return it. The book has sentimental value to you as it had been presented by your grandmother. Write a letter to your friend. In the letter:ask how he or she is doingremind him / her about the bookexplain why you need it back
text: How are you these days? It has been a while we have not met with each other. I think we can go out and find a nice coffee shop, we can spend a lazy afternoon there afterwards.

When you come, please be reminded to bring along you the novel I lent you last winter. The one with a blue cover and the author of which is Linda Jones. Actually, the book is of special value to me. It is a gift from my late grandmother, she gave it to me as a birthday present when I was very young.

My teacher recently asked me to submit a reading report and I planned to write it with this novel. I guess you either have finished reading it or just do not have the time for it anyway, so please bring the book with you when we meet.
